welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kippax, a charming town in the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes and quaint atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Jet2 Terminal
terminals.description: The Jet2 terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is dedicated to flights operated by Jet2.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.
